article:
Both adults and children like  _  TV.Most children like watching CCTV-14.It's very interesting. _  watching TV they can see and learn a lot and know many  _  about their country and the world.Of course,they can also learn many things on the  _ .But they can learn better with TV.Why?Because they can watch and  _  at the same time.But they can see  _  on the radio.
Many children watch TV on  _  or Sunday evening.They are always busy with their  _ .But a  _  children watch TV every night.They go to bed very  _ .They can't have a good rest.This is not good for their health.
